name: Cyborg Til You Dieborg Online
description:
Hack-n-Slash Deathmatch online!

Matts Netcode

This is a tech demo for my multiplayer engine within Unity. If you would like to make your own 2D online multiplayer game, find out more here http://mattconcepts.com/netcode.html

I'm intending on making a full release with more juice, polish, better maps and modes, so if you enjoyed what's then throw a follow :D

To Play!

Download, Unzip, Run Game Launcher. When updated, hit play to launch the game.

In game setup your character, then hit the Join button. You should see some games listed, click(sometimes double click-bug) to join :D

Controls

Use mouse on menus. Only have Keyboard support so far in game:

directional arrows - move around

Z - Use sword

X - Dash

C - Shoot (4 shots then reload)

Goal

First to 10 kills wins that round
